{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.artik.io/modules/artik-1020/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Samsung |model = ARTIK |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 1020 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = IoT board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = A3LATKM102000 |icid = 649E-ATKM102000 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Samsung;Exynos 5422;(5 Octa); |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1_type2 = ARMv7 |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |cpu1spd2 = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMAG2GEAC-B002; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = STMicro;S25PE10VP; |flash2size = 128 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = ASIX;AX88760; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 8E:4C:2E |oui = EC:9B:F3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2012.07; |stockos = Linux;3.10.93;Fedora 22;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, J12,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1 LE, ZigBee, Z-Wave, MIPI DSI, I2C, GPIO, Micro HDMI 1.4, Audio 3.5mm out, |addchip = ZigBee SoC (32-bit ARM Cortex-M3);Silicon Labs;EM3587;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz ZigBee/Smart Energy FEM;SiGe (Skyworks);SE2432L;;1; ,,, Z-Wave SoC (ZM5304-U Module);Sigma Designs;SD3503A-CNE3;;1; ,,, Single-Chip SIGFOX RF Transceiver;Atmel;ATA8520D;;1; ,,, IoT Secure Element;Samsung;S3FV5RP;;1; ,,, USB to Serial UART;FTDI;FT232R;;1; ,,, Power Management IC;Samsung;S2MPS11B02;;1; ,,, 8-bit Bi-directional Voltage Translator;TI;TXS0108E;;3; ,,, I2C Controlled 3A Single Cell USB Charger;TI;BQ24296;;1; ,,, Dual P-Channel 30V MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4953ADY;;1; ,,, HDMI Companion Chip with I2C Level Shifting Buffer;TI;TPD12S016;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = root |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/21/2016 |estreldate = 02/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Samsung SWB-B80 |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4354; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->

*[https://github.com/balena-os/meta-artik/blob/master/recipes-bsp/broadcom-nvram-config/files/brcmfmac4354-sdio.txt ''brcmfmac4354-sdio'' on '''GitHub'''] :BCM4354WLCSP_A1 with iPA/eLNA :SEMCO SWB-B80 ''M3'' module
;[http://www.samsungsem.com/global/product/module/wireless-lan/wifi-combo-module/index.jsp SEMCO Wireless Combo Modules] :<small>SEMCO - SAMSUNG ELECTRO-MECHANICS COMPANY</small> *SWB-A05, SWB-A07, SWB-A21, SWB-A22, SWB-A31 *SWB-B10, SWB-B12, SWB-B14, SWB-B22, SWB-B23, :SWB-B30, SWB-B42, SWB-B80, SWB-B85, SWB-B85B *SWB-M12, SWB-M14, SWB-M20, [https://www.bluetooth.org/tpg/RefNotes/SWB-QC30H_Datasheet%20Rev7_TTA.pdf SWB-QC30H] ([[QCA]])
